page.title: 02FACILITIES IN BLAYDON (1)
page.content: CINEMAS: There used to be two cinemas in Blaydon and Winlaton. The REX was in Winlaton and the Roxy was in Blaydon opposite St. Cuthbert's Church. Now they are both used as Bngo Halls. The buildings are about seventy years old. SWIMMING POOLS: Blaydon has a medium sized heated swmming pool available for full public use and by school parties. There is a small heated pool at Blaydon Comprehensive School. BLAYDON YOUTH CLUB: The club has been open in its purpose built building for ten years. It has a sports hall, a little shop, a disco room, a pool room and there is a balcony overlooking the sports hall.There is archery, table tennis and video games.
